  • Uses of NumberType in io.shiromi.saml.types

    Fields in io.shiromi.saml.types declared as NumberType
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final NumberType
    NumberType.MAX_VALUE
    This NumberType stores the maximum double value 0x1.FFFFFFFFFFFFFP1023, or in integer notation (2-2-52)×2127, equal to the double max value
    static final NumberType
    NumberType.MIN_VALUE
    This NumberType stores the minimum double value 0x0.0000000000001P-1022, or in integer notation 2-1074, equal to the double min value
    static final NumberType
    NumberType.NaN
    This NumberType stores a Not-a-Number (NaN) value, equal to the result of 0.0d / 0.0
    static final NumberType
    NumberType.NEGATIVE_INFINITY
    This NumberType stores the value of -Infinity, equal to the result of -1.0d / 0.0
    static final NumberType
    NumberType.POSITIVE_INFINITY
    This NumberType stores the value of Infinity, equal to the result of 1.0d / 0.0
